00066     {

00079     {
00080         $current = $this->current();
00081         return $current && $current instanceof Zend_Mail_Storage_Folder && !$current->isLeaf();

00131         return current($this->_folders);

00151     public function __get($name)
00152     {
00153         if (!isset($this->_folders[$name])) {
00157             require_once 'Zend/Mail/Storage/Exception.php';
00158             throw new Zend_Mail_Storage_Exception("no subfolder named $name");
00159         }
00160 
00161         return $this->_folders[$name];
00162     }
00163 
00171     public function __set($name, Zend_Mail_Storage_Folder $folder)
00172     {
00173         $this->_folders[$name] = $folder;
00174     }

00183     {

00193     {
00194         return (string)$this->getGlobalName();

00233     {
